TopicTitle: Apollo Mission Recreation (And More!) [Requesting Ground Crew Aid!]

Articles.Content:
[quote name='Dman979']OY NOY!

Oh well. We have a launch in
5 days 20 hours 08 minutes 35 seconds![/QUOTE]

Is it ok if I read that in Data's voice?
We should make a countdown timer...

[quote name='CliftonM']We should make a countdown timer...[/QUOTE]

Yeah. I second that. I found one online, but I couldn't link it here.

[quote name='Dman979']Yeah. I second that. I found one online, but I couldn't link it here.[/QUOTE]
I'll see what I can do.

[COLOR="silver"][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

What time?

[COLOR="silver"][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

Exact date and time.
Sunday, November 29, 2015, 13:59:56 (EST) is ignition.

[url]http://www.eltrin.com/WebHost/Users/CliftonM/KerbHealth/[/url]
In the health thing, we now just have general info.

[COLOR="silver"][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

Including a countdown.

No, we learned that it was canceled- ZNG forgot to show up! :P

The "mod" that CliftonM posted is not a mod- it's a webpage.

[quote name='Mods_o_joy']The Entire mission is canceled?![/QUOTE]

Nonono.

Just the minimercury mission I was doing to test the mission control team. The Apollo missions is still far underway.

[quote name='Mods_o_joy']wait so did i miss the Apollo Mission !!?[/QUOTE]
No. It was a mini mercury mission. Mainly to test everything out to make sure it's all good. The apollo mission is VERY far away.

[quote name='Dman979']Sunday, November 29, 2015, 13:59:56 (EST) is ignition.[/QUOTE]

Dang! I will be out of town and will miss it. Guess I will have to read about it here once I get back. :(
You can still watch the stream. Also there is a countdown on the link is posted.
Ran preflight check on crew health, and it's all good.
Just a heads up: On the 28th the forum will be down. You've probably accounted for that, but I wanted to make sure you knew.

We all know. ^There's a banner right up there^

[COLOR=silver][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

Count down is also here: [URL]http://www.eltrin.com/WebHost/Users/CliftonM/KerbHealth/[/URL]
What are the names of our Kerbal crew that's going into space?

[quote name='adsii1970']What are the names of our Kerbal crew that's going into space?[/QUOTE]
No clue. I'll go onto the server and make specific ones.

[COLOR="silver"][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

No, it didn't...

Hi all. A reminder- ignition is at GMT 18:59:56, November 29, 2015.

The mission control team should be online and at stations by 18:00:00 GMT on the same day. Be sure to check your internet connections, mods, and comms setup.

To everyone else:
The PAO will make an announcement about when the livestream will start and how to access it.
*insert edited out confusion here*

ZNG will let us know, but I don't know right now.

[quote name='Mods_o_joy']Also i cant be here From at 8:10 to 11:30 On friday[/QUOTE]

That's fine, the launch is on Sunday.
I have the IP, etc. PM me if you need it.
